Additionally, \"Loro\" wishes to tell the story of some Italians, fresh and ancient people at the same time: souls from a modern imaginary Purgatory who, moved by heterogeneous intents like ambition, admiration, affection, curiosity, personal interests, establish to try and orbit around the walking Paradise that is the man named Silvio Berlusconi.","poster_path":"/alZtZ2cOmSen1CCitIsEA0OMVHz.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":6.1,"release_date":"2018-05-10","video":false,"vote_average":7.173,"vote_count":366},{"backdrop_path":"/bgDhNUlJ3ZmtjgXzgj0tCpacwBt.jpg","id":334536,"title":"The Blackcoat's Daughter","original_title":"The Blackcoat's Daughter","overview":"Two young women at a prestigious prep school are assailed by an evil, invisible power when they're stranded over winter break.","poster_path":"/3K8gBMk9W02G62Zrimm9xipmc1p.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,9648],"popularity":21.691,"release_date":"2017-03-31","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":619},{"backdrop_path":"/aDi4GqSYi4pcTvS7A9AuXLuhUVQ.jpg","id":25866,"title":"The Sucker","original_title":"Le Corniaud","overview":"In this Frenco-Italian gangster parody, a shop keeper on his way to an Italian holiday suffers a crash which totals his car.
